titleStmt.title: A certificate of what hath been done upon the poll-money, as well upon the act of poll-money, as upon the order of review of the same.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: "The form of certificate with blanks alluded to in Ordinance of 29 Nov."--Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majesty: and
